name: takuan-osho-ccmarketplace
description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace with productivity skills for git workflows, reporting, and development tools.

plugins.name: create-pr
plugins.description: Create Pull Request with automated change analysis and Conventional Commits format

plugins.name: gcm
plugins.description: Generate Git Commit Message from staged changes following Conventional Commits format

plugins.name: report
plugins.description: Create structured investigation and analysis reports in GitHub Flavored Markdown

plugins.name: gemini-search
plugins.description: Web search using Google Gemini CLI tool

plugins.name: k6-docs
plugins.description: Access Grafana k6 documentation for writing and debugging load testing scripts

plugins.name: tdl
plugins.description: Implement Traceable Development Lifecycle practices with end-to-end traceability tools
